text: Lasianthus ciliatus is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tamil Nadu in India. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Lasianthus ciliatus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Lasianthus ciliatus
